source:
%%sql
-- Build ims_attribute_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_attribute_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.bdca_id IS NULL
        THEN T3.IMSAttributeID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                                         AS IMSAttributeID, -- surrogate key
    T1.bdca_id                                                  AS BDCAID,
    T1.id                                                       AS AttributeID,
    T1.bdc_attribute_name                                       AS BDCAttributeName,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number                                 AS BDCAttributeNumber,
    T1.bdc_attribute_num_container                              AS BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c                              AS BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    T1.bdc_entity_num_container                                 AS BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    T1.is_this_personal_data_c                                  AS IsPersonalData,
    T1.minimise_after_processing_c                              AS MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    T1.help                                                     AS IMSAttributeHelp,
    T1.is_this_special_category_data                            AS IsSpecialCategoryData,
    T1.retention_period                                         AS RetentionPeriod,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1                       AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name                  AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida     AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1                  AS IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    T1.user_id_c                                                AS IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    T1.information_owner_c                                      AS IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    T1.user_id1_c                                               AS IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    T1.information_expert_c                                     AS IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    T1.type                                                     AS IMSAttributeType,
    T1.status                                                   AS IMSAttributeStatus,
    T1.priority                                                 AS IMSAttributePriority,
    T1.resolution                                               AS IMSAttributeResolution,
    T1.work_log                                                 AS IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    T1.fk_bdce_id                                               AS IMSAttributeFkBDCEID,
    T1.date_modified                                            AS IMSAttributeDateModified,
    T2.SourceSystemID                                           AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                              AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( 
        IFNULL(T1.bdca_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_num_container,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.is_this_personal_data_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.minimise_after_processing_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.is_this_special_category_data,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_period,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.fk_bdce_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.')))                          AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                                         AS IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive                                                 AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_attribute T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON  "IMS" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim T3 
    ON  T1.bdca_id = T3.BDCAID AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN    T1.bdca_id = T3.BDCAID AND 
                    md5(concat(
                        IFNULL(T1.bdca_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bdc_attribute_num_container,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.is_this_personal_data_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.minimise_after_processing_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.is_this_special_category_data,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.retention_period,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.user_id1_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.information_expert_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.fk_bdce_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.')))  <> T3.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.IMSAttributeID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.bdca_id IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_attribute);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **ims_attribute_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAID,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IsPersonalData,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IMSAttributeType,
    IMSAttributeStatus,
    IMSAttributePriority,
    IMSAttributeResolution,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IMSAttributeFkBDCEID,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From ims_attribute_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAID,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IsPersonalData,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IMSAttributeType,
    IMSAttributeStatus,
    IMSAttributePriority,
    IMSAttributeResolution,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IMSAttributeFkBDCEID,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim
WHERE BDCAID IN (SELECT BDCAID FROM ims_attribute_dim_new WHERE IMSAttributeID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM ims_attribute_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAID,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IsPersonalData,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IMSAttributeType,
    IMSAttributeStatus,
    IMSAttributePriority,
    IMSAttributeResolution,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IMSAttributeFkBDCEID,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_attribute_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim AS Target
USING ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.IMSAttributeID = Target.IMSAttributeID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (IMSAttributeID,
        BDCAID,
        AttributeID,
        BDCAttributeName,
        BDCAttributeNumber,
        BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
        BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
        BDCEntityNumberContainer,
        IsPersonalData,
        MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
        IMSAttributeHelp,
        IsSpecialCategoryData,
        RetentionPeriod,
        IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
        IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
        IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
        IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
        IMSAttributeUserIDC,
        IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
        IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
        IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
        IMSAttributeType,
        IMSAttributeStatus,
        IMSAttributePriority,
        IMSAttributeResolution,
        IMSAttributeWorkLog,
        IMSAttributeFkBDCEID,
        IMSAttributeDateModified,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.IMSAttributeID,
        Source.BDCAID,
        Source.AttributeID,
        Source.BDCAttributeName,
        Source.BDCAttributeNumber,
        Source.BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
        Source.BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
        Source.BDCEntityNumberContainer,
        Source.IsPersonalData,
        Source.MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
        Source.IMSAttributeHelp,
        Source.IsSpecialCategoryData,
        Source.RetentionPeriod,
        Source.IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
        Source.IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
        Source.IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
        Source.IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
        Source.IMSAttributeUserIDC,
        Source.IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
        Source.IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
        Source.IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
        Source.IMSAttributeType,
        Source.IMSAttributeStatus,
        Source.IMSAttributePriority,
        Source.IMSAttributeResolution,
        Source.IMSAttributeWorkLog,
        Source.IMSAttributeFkBDCEID,
        Source.IMSAttributeDateModified,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_attribute_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY IMSAttributeID,BDCAID NULLS LAST) AS IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAID,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IsPersonalData,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IMSAttributeType,
    IMSAttributeStatus,
    IMSAttributePriority,
    IMSAttributeResolution,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IMSAttributeFkBDCEID,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim ;
